title: The Earthsea Quartet
description: The four books of the legendary Earthsea saga together for the first time in a single volume:A Wizard of EarthseaThe Tombs of AtuanThe Farthest ShoreTehanuUrsula Le Guin's creation, Earthsea - an ancient world of wizards, magic, darkness and light, and an ever-shifting balance of power - is an acknowledged masterpiece.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin
